LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionOffset.label: slave suppression offset
LanguageData.SlaveSuppressionOffset.description: An offset applied to the wearer's slave suppression. Higher values suppress slaves longer, while lower values make slaves rebel more often.
LanguageData.TerrorSource.label: terror
LanguageData.TerrorSource.description: The intensity of terror this object induces when viewed.
